ComicInfo.Penciller: Erik Larsen,Rob Haynes,Tomm Coker,Michael Dooney,Rick Leonardi,Erik Larsen,Rob Haynes,Tomm Coker
ComicInfo.Summary:
Unknown to Lt. Darling, superheroine Dart joins the Chicago police force. In New York, Dragon and the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles defeat a mysterious magical gargoyle. A little boy discovers a dead couple in De Kalb, Illinois. Star fights Inferno and loses his hair.
Contains Star short story by Erik Larsen (story), Rob Haynes (pencils), and Tony Harris (inks)
Also, the flip of this book is Vanguard #0. The lead-in to the Vanguard Vol. 1 mini-series. Written by Gary Carlson, pencilled by Tomm Coker, and inked by Jim Sinclair.
